examples: He won by two strokes (= in golf, by taking two fewer strokes than his opponent).
Ganó por dos golpes (= en golf, ejecutando dos golpes menos que su oponente).
He played some powerful backhand strokes throughout the game.
Jugó algunos golpes de revés poderosos durante todo el juego.
His punishment was six strokes of the cane.
Su castigo fueron seis golpes de bastón.
